text: Zvirokwazvo, avo vanopa Bay’ah (Chitsidzo) kwauri (Muhammad (SAW)), chokwadi, vari kupa Bay’ah kuna Allah. Ruoko rwaAllah rwuri pamusoro pemaoko avo. Zvino uyo anoputsa chitsidzo chake anenge azviputsira iye pachake, uye uyo anozadzisa chitsidzo chaakatsidzira kuna Allah, ivo vachamupa mubairo mukuru
